message.body: Hey Ed
Hey, how's it going?
Just workin for the weekend
As am I. Have any plans?
I'm going to a union soccer game with my special lady friend
Ah, very nice. Is that the Minor League team? Also, same special lady friend?
No the union is a pro MLS team, I think zack had season tix to union games at one time.
Same lady friend too!
Yeah, I recognized the name from Zac, but I couldn't remember the Major/Minor. Major League soccer is pretty much still Minor in the US.
Only met the lady friend twice, but she seems pretty sweet.
Yeah she is a good one. She is going a bit crazy tho cuz it's finals week
Yes yes. Finals week. I'm really glad to be out of school (not that that's new or anything). You went to grad school, no?
Yes I did but I was in art school so I had less papers and academic studies than most probably.
It was still stressful tho, at least grad school was
Yeah, I have no desire to go back to school at all. If there was some reason I had to go back, I prob would, but not by my own choice.
I would go back anytime provided it did not result in increased debt.
What did you study in college
Print Journalism. Not the best subject to graduate from right before the print industry crumbled.
But what can you do.
er, ? rather.
Well it's still applicable to online formats, no?
It is, but at the same time that causes the same problem that digital music distribution caused of overflooding the market.
Therefore it gets harder to make any headway or money doing it; less ad revenue and more writers.
Yes I see.
So you just need to create a journalistic outlet of your own online
Sounds difficult to make a living that way
But it can't be worse than the visual arts
Oh, and also, Journalism was a backup. First I studied Engineering as my backup, but it was too much work for something I wasn't really interested in.
When I dropped Engineering I wanted to go into film, but it was a closed major and I needed certain credits by the time I was transferring.
So I settled on Journalism as a backup backup.
Yeah but u seem pretty into journalism and music
Did you ever make a film or work on a film?
I'm into writing, and I'm into writing about music, but def not politics or current events.
Writing about 90210...
So what was the last round of video recording you did for, an upcoming show?
In general writing about music was more of a way to utilize my major.
Now that's what I call writing for pleasure, writing for myself. Very satisfying.
(1/2)Yeah, I'm playing Saturday. I also played this past Saturday. I had one of the tracks from the recent round of video in the last one, and I'm adding the
(2/2)other for the upcoming show.
Emogees do not work.
I see that
Where are you playing this weekend
Playing JB's tonite and a place called Salon 1522 tomorrow night. It's in the same area.
Cool, is it a solo performance?
Tonight's the band's album release show, tomorrow night is a solo performance at an art opening.
Ahhh I see, good luck!
What's the art opening?
It's called (no) Hope, pronounced Hope/No Hope. The theme is the combination of hopefulness with hopelessness.
Your solo music seems befitting for such an event
Yeah, the person running it saw my set last summer or something like that and immediately wanted me to play this event.
At that point, though, it didn't have a place or funding, etc. So it's taken awhile to get it together, but now it's happening.
That's great. Did they give you a grant
No no no. I think she was looking for just some sponsorship type of thing. I'm not too involved in all that stuff, mostly just working on my set for it.
Is that show at the art opening going to have the video footage you shot recently
Yep.
So does the band have a tour on the horizon
Yeah, we're going out in June in support of the album.
How many fullscale tours have you been on at this point? It's got to be a lot.
I'm not entirely sure, maybe 10 or something. We actually just compiled a list of shows, but I'd have to check. Also, it doesn't go back all the way.
Nice! Is there a good buzz around the new album? How did it come out?
It seems like there's some momentum about it. It's coming out on Tuesday on Ernest Jennings.
Is that label new for you guys? I don't know muc about it
Yeah, they release O'Death and Dinosaur Feathers and a few other bands that we're friends with.
That's cool
I haven seen O'Death in a while are they still together
Yeah, they're actually playing Kung Fu Necktie soon. Or just did. Not sure. They asked us to play but it was too close to tonight's show.
BTW, sorry I've been only answering questions and not asking. But thank you for asking the questions, cuz it's easier for me and I'm editing right now.
No problem. Do you remember what time our conversation will get cut off?
In about a half hour.
Ok. What have u been editing?
Video for tomorrow.
That makes sense.
